preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 270 g of silver using a precision balance.
2. Measure 680 g of cadmium and ensure it is finely powdered.
3. Measure 18 g of silicon in a separate container.
4. Measure 540 g of samarium and ensure it is finely powdered as well.
5. In a clean mixing bowl, combine all measured materials thoroughly using a spatula to ensure a homogeneous mixture.
